title: Hard Conversations
description:
Swagu and Perk discuss Zion Williamson's failure to reach out to CJ McCollum until it became public, how Luka Doncic has gotten back into shape, why a photograph from the weekend touched Perk, and why you have to put in the work to gain success. Let's get it!

itunes:author: ESPN, Marcus Spears, Kendrick Perkins
